posts.post_content:
Free s/h, net to me.

T205, Vaughn, SP -- 75

Thanks, Scott
I will take it. Just sent the payment thru pp/ff.
I e-mailed Scott before Mike’s post saying I would take it. I guess Scott will have to work out who gets it.

Guys,

Just got home from work.

I can't remember this happening in a long time, if ever.

David did email me with commitment to buy the card before Mike's post and paypal payment.

I have to go with first correspondence, as I always have in past.

Mike, I have refunded your paypal payment, sorry if there are any hard feelings.

Take care, Scott
Would've preferred to see a cage match but your solution seems to be more pragmatic. Nonetheless, a great card!

No hard feelings. I get it.

Thanks!!
